mapper.sql: id, com_id, table_id, group_name, init_show_flg, sort_no, enableflg, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time

sctg.id as id, sctg.com_id as comId, sctg.table_id as tableId, sctg.group_name as groupName, sctg.init_show_flg as initShowFlg, sctg.sort_no as sortNo, sctg.enableflg as enableflg, sctg.created_by as createdBy, sctg.created_time as createdTime, sctg.updated_by as updatedBy, sctg.updated_time as updatedTime
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_com_table_group (com_id, table_id, group_name, init_show_flg, sort_no, enableflg, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time) values (#{comId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tableId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initShowFlg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enableflg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_com_table_group set com_id=#{comId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, table_id=#{tableId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_name=#{groupName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, init_show_flg=#{initShowFlg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_no=#{sortNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enableflg=#{enableflg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by=#{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_time=#{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by=#{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_time=#{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
